message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $70. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $82. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $78. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm not willing to go all the way to $78, but I'm willing to make a small concession. I can offer it to you for $85. It's a great price, and I think you'll really love the product!
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $80. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $82.5. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
